amendment.description: To modify a provision relating to providing support for activities to increase the resiliency of the National Highway System to mitigate the cost of damages from wildfires.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2358 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 2358 proposed by Senator Carper for Senator Rosen to Amendment SA 2137. (consideration: CR S5816, S5818; text: CR S5816) To modify a provision relating to providing support for activities to increase the resiliency of the National Highway System to mitigate the cost of damages from wildfires.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2358 proposed by Senator Carper for Senator Rosen to Amendment SA 2137.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2358 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
